EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Big Data Roadshow Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 21, 2015 Pivotal Office One Toronto St 11th Floor Toronto, ON MSC 2V6 Canada REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across industries. This event provides an opportunity to learn about new developments in the rapidly-changing world of big data and understand best practices in building advanced analytics and data-driven applications. Additionally, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using Pivotalâ€™s market-leading Big Data Suite. Register <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 10:15 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
10:15 AM - 10:30 AM Coffee Break
10:30 AM - 12:00 PM Advanced Analytics Demo and Modern Application Architecture Overview
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch & Birds of a Feather Discussion
1:00 PM - 3:00 PM Hands-on Technical Workshop VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow>
